title: About Me
description: I am a full stack web developer with a strong foundation in building responsive and user-focused web applications. With experience in the MERN stack, I enjoy turning complex problems into clean, efficient, and scalable solutions. My approach combines technical precision with thoughtful design to create seamless digital experiences.

Beyond coding, I have a deep appreciation for creativity and aesthetics. I believe great development is not only about functionality but also about crafting interfaces that feel intuitive and visually refined. This balance between logic and creativity allows me to build products that are both powerful and elegant.
